title: Burt's Bees Orange Essence Facial Cleanser, 4.3 Ounces
description: Brighten up your day and your skin with gentle and sulfate-free Burt’s Bees® Orange Essence Facial Cleanser. Infused with orange oil and soap bark extract, this tube of plant-based facial scrub removes dirt, oil and make-up. Formulated with vegetable-based glycerin, olive and oat oils, it also helps nourish and moisturize your skin. After cleansing your skin with this 100% natural face wash, follow with your favorite Burt’s Bees® toning and moisturizing facial products. Put the power of nature to work for your skin with Burt’s Bees.

title: Burt's Bees Beeswax Moisturizing Night Creme, 1-Ounce Jar
description: Formulated with Vitamin E and botanical oils, this night creme helps moisturize, nourish and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles naturally.

title: California Olive Ranch Extra Virgin Olive Oil -- 25.4 fl oz
description: California Olive Ranch cold presses their award winning 100% California grown olives within hours of picking for a fresher taste. The distinct green bottle keeps their sustainably grown, premium extra virgin olive oil fresh longer.

title: Jane Carter Solution Wrap and Roll, 8 Oz.
description: Jane carter solution wrap and roll is the best soft mousse, setting and wrapping product available on the market today. It dries clean and soft without leaving and residue. Great for dry color-treated or damaged hair, the natural glycerides, essential oils and moisturizers leave your hair soft and shiny. Cut dryer time in half by applying wrap and roll liberally to wet hair, then wrap/set and dry as usual or let it dry naturally.

title: 18pcs Hair Rollers Snail Rolls Styling Curler Tools, Easy At Home DIY Natural Way
description: Do you dream of having glamorous, Veronica Lake style hair? Using these rollers & curlers is a simple way to give your hair lift, body and a head full of beautiful curls or waves! With it you'll be able to roll your hair quickly and easily and achieve movie starlet worthy hair.

title: Redken Dandruff Control Shampoo, 10.1 Ounce
description: Helps eliminate and combat dandruff and its symptoms while gently cleansing hair
